name: Infiltration / Unlikely Allies
ObjectiveText1: Deploy Nar Shaddaa, Undercity and Scoundrel's Luck. {For} remainder of game, your gamblers, information brokers, and spies are scoundrels. You may not deploy Nightfall or cards with ability except scoundrels and Independent Starships. 'Luke' on opponent's (Reflection II) objective is treated as 'Kyle Katarn.' Once per turn, may deploy a battleground site to Nar Shaddaa from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. {While} this side up, your Force drains at systems are -1. {Flip} this card if If Imperial Navigation Charts is 'stolen'
ObjectiveText2: {While} this side up, your scoundrels are forfeit +1. Your Force Generation is +1 for each battlegound you occupy with a scoundrel (to a maximum of +2). 'Once' on Scoundrel's Luck is treated as 'twice.' During your control phase, may retrieve 1 Force. Once during your turn, may place a card from hand in your Used Pile or Lost Pile, shuffle that pile and take the top card into hand.  {Flip} this card if Imperial Navigation Charts is not on table (unless you have completed a (v) Kessel Run).
